articles.title: Hundreds of labour exploitation victims found near Lisbon
articles.description: Hundreds of alleged victims of labour exploitation were found on Wednesday in different locations near Portugal's capital Lisbon, including inside a big warehouse where they were kept to work in the illegal harvesting of shellfish.
articles.content:
